No matter where you stay, we hope you enjoy your visit to NYU and take advantage of the wonderful resources the City has to offer.   This list is provided for informational purposes only. While some of these hotels offer discounts for the NYU community, we neither endorse nor seek to promote any particular hotel.             New York, NY  Name    Distance to NYU (Washington Square Park) Amenities 2015 NYU Rates Near By     Courtyard Soho , 181 Varick St,  New York, NY 10013  +1-800-321-2211      .6 miles Complimentary in-room WiFi, On-site Health Club Standard Queen $235-$395 Washington Sq. Name Distance to NYU, D.C. Amenities 2015 NYU Rates Near by   Club Quarters, Washington, D.C.   839 17th Street, NW   Washington, DC 2006   +1-202-974-4222  .7 Miles Complimentary Wi-Fi, Business Center, Gym For Club Room: $167-$207  For Standard Room:  $187-$227  For Superior Room:  $207-$247  For Suite: $237-$277 The White House, Washington Monument, The Capitol Building, The Mint, The National Archives, and The Smithsonian Museums         back to top ^           Chauffeur Service          Carey International, a global leader in ground transportation and chauffeur service, is now a preferred University vendor. Carey offers NYU two options of chauffeur service:     Carey International -- premier luxury sedans (Cadillac XTS and Lincoln Towncars)   Embarque -- economic option with environmentally-friendly vehicles (Toyota Prius+ and Toyota Camry)   University travelers will have access to both classes of service.                                                    Departmental Account Setup                               To set up a departmental account with Carey International, please send an e-mail to nyutraveler.info@nyu.edu requesting a departmental account set-up form.  Once you have a departmental account, you will have access to NYU-negotiated rates.  Payment options include:     Central billing   Corporate Travel Account   Purchase Order                                                                To Book Chauffeur Service                               You may use the following sites:     Carey - To book for one's own travel   Carey Connect - For departmental administrators responsible for booking travel for others   Embarque - To book one's own travel     To Call Carey     US Reservations: 1800-336-4646   International Desk: 1800-842-8420       To Call Embarque   General Reservations: 866-444-2144                                back to top ^               Car Rentals          For NYU Students, Faculty and Employees: Car rental reservations may be made via AMEX Travel or Egencia by clicking "BOOK" on the main page of NYU Traveler . By doing so your travel plans will be automatically transmitted to Worldcue, a traveler safety service NYU has enlisted to provide you with up-to-the-minute information of potential threats to your safety during your travels. If you wish to make a car rental reservation directly with the car rental provider, please see below.   NOTE: The insurance that is built into the NYU rental car rates is specific only to business travel. If you are utilizing the NYU rates for personal travel, you are encouraged to buy additional insurance at the front desk of the rental facility, as the insurance included in our rates will not cover incidents that occur while renting for personal use.                     AVIS          For NYU Students, Faculty and Employees ONLY                                                    Make an AVIS Reservation                               To make an Avis reservation, NYU staff, faculty, and students should return to the NYU Traveler Home Page and make their reservation using one of our preferred vendors: American Express Travel or Egencia.                                                                Enroll in AVIS Preferred Service                               For first time AVIS users, click here to enroll in AVIS PREFFERED SERVICE . Avis Preferred Service Membership is FREE and encouraged for NYU students, faculty and employees.Membership in Avis Preferred allows you to bypass the rental counter and go directly to your car, without waiting in line or for paperwork! Simply complete the online application and use your wizard number to make your reservation. Due to insurance requirements, only NYU Students, Faculty, and Employees may use this link.                       For NYU Friends and Family                                                      Make an AVIS Reservation                               Click here, to make a reservation using the NYU Friends and Family Discount .     In addition, the following coupons are available:     $25 Off Weekly Rental   Free Weekend Day   Free Upgrade   Two Free Days of GPS     Please note that the NYU Friends and Family Discount does not include insurance . You may purchase insurance through Avis at checkout, or opt to use your own if your credit card or automobile insurance policy includes insurance for rental cars.                            ENTERPRISE             For NYU Students, Faculty and Employees Only                                                    Make an ENTERPRISE Reservation                               To make an Enterprise reservation, NYU staff, faculty, and students should return to the NYU Traveler Home Page and make their reservation using one of our preferred vendors: American Express Travel or Egencia.                           back to top ^            Rail          AMTRAK          NYU has a contract with Amtrak which provides a 5% – 20% discount (determined by city pairs) on Acela Express Business Class service. The discount may ONLY be obtained by booking your Amtrak Acela Express reservation through AMEX Travel or Egencia. Please note, the discount will not be applied UNTIL clicking the final purchase button.             back to top ^                              On This Page     Hotels   Manhattan   Brooklyn   Washington, D.C.       Car Rentals   Rail                                              NYU Footer          Search      Directory      Campus Map      Events      Contact Us      Site Map      Copyright and Fair Use      Feedback         Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University. Communicative Sciences and Disorders - NYU Steinhardt                                                                                NYU Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development       Department of Communicative Sciences and Disorders                                         Communicative Sciences and Disorders                                                                           Welcome                The NYU Department of Communicative Sciences and Disorders aims to understand, assess, and treat speech, voice, language, and swallowing disorders in individuals across the lifespan. As a result of the field's interdisciplinary nature, our graduates go on to work in speech-language pathology, medicine, linguistics, education, psychology, audiology, academia, engineering, and the sciences.    Our department offers programs of study for undergraduate , master's and doctoral students. There is also a state-of-the-art speech-language-hearing disorders clinic that provides diagnostic and rehabilitative services to the public.          News and Events    News        Practicum 2 and 3 graduate students serve on the Autism Science Foundation’s Young Professional’s Committee      Clinic client Megan Crosbie talks with grad students about her experience living with Aphasia      Doctoral student Stacey Rimikis wins best poster award at Steinhardt Scholarship Day                 More                                                                              This site, and all its contents, are Copyright ©       by New York University. All rights reserved. No matter where you stay, we hope you enjoy your visit to NYU and take advantage of the wonderful resources the City has to offer.   This list is provided for informational purposes only. While some of these hotels offer discounts for the NYU community, we neither endorse nor seek to promote any particular hotel. Communicative Sciences and Disorders - NYU Steinhardt                                                                                NYU Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development       Department of Communicative Sciences and Disorders                                         Communicative Sciences and Disorders                                                                           Welcome                The NYU Department of Communicative Sciences and Disorders aims to understand, assess, and treat speech, voice, language, and swallowing disorders in individuals across the lifespan. As a result of the field's interdisciplinary nature, our graduates go on to work in speech-language pathology, medicine, linguistics, education, psychology, audiology, academia, engineering, and the sciences.    Our department offers programs of study for undergraduate , master's and doctoral students. There is also a state-of-the-art speech-language-hearing disorders clinic that provides diagnostic and rehabilitative services to the public.
